1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Miss. Perfect Ma Hae Ri finally becomes a prosecutor. On the day of graduation she tells a lie to skip the workshop to go to the ski resort. She arrives, not only to enjoy herself with the sport, but for the Gioberni launching show. However, after she indulges herself in the pleasure of skiing, she walks back to her car, catching the car-thief red-handed. She pursuits the thief, but loses him.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Hye Ri freaks out as she spots In Woo at the office. She mistakes him for having come for the money, and drags him out to the corridor. Prosecutor Yoon follows after them and shouts what she's doing to the guest lawyer that came to see him. Surprised, Hye Ri looks at In Woo in bewilderment who takes out his name card and hands it to her, introducing himself.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Inside the police car, Hye Ri is nervous that they'll find out the fact that she's a prosecutor. As she shows her concern to her friend Yuna, she suggests asking for help to In Woo, as he is a lawyer. Hye Ri is hesitant to call him since she did wrong by kicking him in the leg, however in the end, makesa phone call to him. In Woo marvels her by clearing up the case in a whip.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Hye Ri in the confusion of the moment, hugs prosecutor Yoon as the attacker charges himself at her. In Woo who light upon the scene, feel strange. At that moment, a man with a knife tries to stab prosecutor Yoon, when a fire explodes, a scene created by In Woo to knock out power. While he was throwing the firebomb, In Woo is surrounded by a mass of attackers.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: As In Woo holds her back and scolds her for trying to run away leaving the case that has neared to an end but incomplete. Moreover, he provokes her by mentioning her skipping the workshop to go to buy designer shoes but still she had her dignity then.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Hye Ri is shocked as she sees the photo of her past on the web. This event also spreads fast in the office. Following promptly, Hye Ri's flashback of the past, of her high school days are showed. Due to her figure, she is teased by her fellow classmates. However thanks to encouragements from her parents, she withstands those days and makes it to law school.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: While talking to In Woo on the phone, Hae Ri finds it peculiar that she can actually hear his voice next to her. She is astonished as she spots In Woo in the terrace a floor higher than hers, and she is greeted by similar reaction. She orders In Woo to come down immediately. Hye Ri demands an explanation why he didn't tell her that he moved.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: In Woo suddenly hugs Hye Ri and all of a sudden kisses her. As Hye Ri jumps away from surprise, In Woo surprises her once more by telling her that Se Joon was there. Meanwhile, Se Joon who watched the scene from a distance, turns hurriedly away. Hye Ri kicks In Woo in the shin but is confused as In Woo explains it was all to induce Se Joon's jelousy.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Hye Ri demands an explanation for the photo of her she found at In Woo's apartment. She questions him if he intentionally approached her at which he answers if she is assuming all that with just one photo. In Woo tells Hye Ri to find out who he is by herself because he doesn't want to explain it.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: At the bar, In Woo mourns with tears in his eyes that he no longer wants to hurt or love Hye Ri. On top of that, he wishes that she no longer existed in his life. Jenny is shocked at his words, and tears well up in her eyes too. Meanwhile, Hye Ri finds out about her mom's promise with her dad: Hye Ri's marriage to a son of congressman Kim.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: When Go Man Chul points the finger at Ma Sang Tae for asking to borrow his ID, Hye Ri is confused at first but recovers from her shock and visits her father. Go Man Chul finds Hye Ri's reaction odd and as he ponders on it, he realizes she is Sang Tae's daughter and makes a quick phone call.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Stepping out of In Woo's office, Hye Ri is sezied by fear from not being able to see him. Hye Ri heads back to the prosecutor's office and come across prosecutor Yoon who asks if there's something wrong to which Hye Ri denies of having any troubles. As night falls, Hye Ri, walking to her house looks up at In Woo's terrace and recalls his promise to be a good friend and falters in her steps.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Hye Ri is shocked to find In Woo and as she backs away, he catches her from tripping. She asks if he had been using her from the beginning, and In Woo confirms that all her suspicions are true. In Woo, unable to leave Hye Ri in her state of shock, drives her home himself. Prosecutors at the office are worried about Hye Ri and call her numerous times but can't reach her.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: In Woo and Hye Ri realize the reality and their feelings for each other, and feel sad as they reminisce on their past. Meawhile, Sang Tae is alarmed as Ae Ja tells him that Hye Ri loves In Woo, and Hye Ri visits Shin Jung Nam to investigate the murder.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Sang Tae reveals the truth of the day. He confesses that he accidentally killed Yoo Myung Woo, whom he went to see because Yoo Myung Woo asked for money during the negotiation process, and as Ma Sang Tae got up to leave, taking the money with him, Yoo Myung Woo tried to stop him by lunging punches at him.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Ma Sang Tae faces bankruptcy, and Hye Ri sees the article on Sang Tae's interrogation on a murder suspicion. In Woo consoles Hye Ri who is worried over Sang Tae, at which time Jenny arrives. Jenny confesses to In Woo that it was she who sent the letter to stop the murder case from being closed.

imdb.plot outline: South Korea's perfect daughter and student, Ma Hae Ri! Shopping and receiving skin treatment as her favorite pastimes, Ma Hae Ri has finally succeeded in becoming a prosecutor. With a mind of an adolescent, and common senses not yet fully developed, her life of extreme ups and downs on the way to becoming a true prosecutor begins. Circling around her are two men: Suh In Woo and Yoon Se Joon. What is to become of this love triangle?
imdb.title: Prosecutor Mata Hari
plot: South Korea's perfect daughter and student, Ma Hae Ri! Shopping and receiving skin treatment as her favorite pastimes, Ma Hae Ri has finally succeeded in becoming a prosecutor. With a mind of an adolescent, and common senses not yet fully developed, her life of extreme ups and downs on the way to becoming a true prosecutor begins. Circling around her are two men: Suh In Woo and Yoon Se Joon. What is to become of this love triangle?
